summary: Accomplished Estimator with 15+ years in civil construction, delivering projects up to $12.66M USD. Specialized in cost estimating and project management, achieving a 95% budget adherence rate across projects.

bullets.text: Provided quantity surveying services and project management to civil construction companies.
Performed detailed quantity take-off for high-profile projects like LDS Temples across Brazil.
metrics: Managed BOQs for areas exceeding 75,305 sq ft.

bullets.text: Followed project development closely, ensuring budget alignment and compliance.
metrics: Achieved through cost assessments and design adjustments.

experience.company: Civil Infrastructure Group — Greater Melbourne Area, VIC
experience.title: Senior Estimator / Quantity Surveyor

bullets.text: Led tender analysis and cost estimation for major infrastructure projects.
Prepared BOQs and managed cost consulting with suppliers for competitive pricing.
Enhanced project efficiency by proposing budget-optimal construction methods.
metrics: Generated cost savings for client by 15%.

bullets.text: Managed scope analysis and quantity take-off for diverse commercial projects.
metrics: Handled projects with contract values up to $24M USD.

bullets.text: Facilitated accurate BOQs and tender documentation, ensuring alignment with client requirements.
Supported dispute resolution and contract drafting to mitigate project risks.
Conducted feasibility studies and cost estimates for high-rise residential projects.
Assisted in securing bank financing through detailed project documentation.
metrics: Ensured timely project funding and initiation.

experience.company: Afonso França Engenharia Ltda. — Sao Paulo, Brazil
experience.title: Quantity Surveyor / Junior Estimator

bullets.text: Carried out comprehensive quantity take-off and cost estimation for healthcare facilities.
metrics: Project scope covered areas up to 242,190 sq ft.

bullets.text: Evaluated design variations, achieving budgetary alignment across stages.
metrics: Additional costs managed effectively within $1.7M USD.
